name: The creature's circle (map)
description:
Deep in a sun soaked jungle, a strange formation of black rocks sits ominously. This map has lots of cover, with longer shadows indicating that some of the rocks in the formation are taller than others. It is especially useful for encounters where enemies might want to utilize cover.

Included in this purchase are 8 files;

  • Day time at 140 DPI with lines included
  • Day time at 140 DPI with no lines
  • Night time at 140 DPI with lines included
  • Night time at 140 DPI with no lines
  • Day time at 70 DPI with lines
  • Day time at 70 DPI with no lines
  • Night time at 70 DPI with lines
  • Night time at 70 DPI with no lines

If you need another format, don’t be afraid to ask!

Please note: Our map packs are offered in .zip format to save us space and save you time.
